WELCOME

5-Year Strategic Plan

Welcome to the Systems 5-Year Strategic Vision and Plan. This vision and plan resulted from the collaboration of dozens of Info Tech leaders over the course of several months. It is grounded the core values and principles that have driven our success for over 40 years. This is a living document that we will revisit regularly. Following is a description of the sections of the vision and plan.

The Vision section presents our vision for the Info Tech Systems business, including the historical context and ecosystem factors on which it is based.

The Goals section presents each division’s 5-year Goal. This goal is the division’s primary 5-year focus. Each Goal has the 2-3 year Objectives through which the division will advance toward their Goal. Each Objective has the Success Measures by which we will know the Objective has been successfully reached. These Goals and Objectives are the foundation from which our annual division, department, units, and personal goals cascade.

The Why section explains the reasoning and motivations on which the vision and plan are based.

The Ecosystem section provides an overview of the construction infrastructure ecosystem within which Info Tech operates and the product ecosystem comprised of Info Tech’s ITI Products services and the AASHTOWare Project product.

If you have questions about your division’s Goal, Objectives, or Success Measures, please contact your Director. For general questions and feedback about the Vision and Plan, please contact the Director for Strategy and Innovation.
